string_table.name: pxabnsnfns11111001101
string_table.string: Use your arrow keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.
To watch this video, use the preview feature in Storyline 360, upload your published output to a server, publish to Review 360, or switch to static video quality.
Streaming video is unavailable for local playback.

slidelink.displaytext: Why do you need to have a Registration Authority?
Why do you need a Smartcard?
Raising request to add Position Assignment
Raising request to add Position Assignment 2
Raising Request to remove or modify Position Assignment
Raising Request to remove or modify Position Assignment 2
Raising Request to remove or modify Position Assignment 3
Chapter Two, Smartcard Unlocking and Certificate Renewal
Chapter Three, Additional Information and Final Assessment

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Here we can see an overview for the interface used throughout this eLearning. Make yourself comfortable and familiarise yourself with the functionality of the eLearning by clicking on the ‘i’ icons to reveal information here." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This course will consist of the following chapters:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter One, Logging on and Position Assignment 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Two, Smartcard Unlocking and Certificate Renewal
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Three, Additional Information and Summary" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="By the end of this course, you should:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Understand the governance and compliance associated with the Registration Authority sponsor process,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with the Registration Authority roles, responsibilities and pre-requisite,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Understand the terms and conditions and process to launch the care identity service, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with the Smartcard unlock and renewal process." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="A Registration Authority is in place for many reasons, such as:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To manage your organisation’s Smartcards,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To assign access as requested,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To ensure patient information is not compromised by monitoring staff compliance with the Terms and Conditions of NHS Smartcard use,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To support Clinical and Non Clinical Staff with Smartcard training, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Accountability to NHS digital by ensuring Information Governance is adhered to.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="This course will end with the completion of a final assessment covering the topics in this course, requiring to score a pass grade of at least 60%.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Smartcards are required by NHS organisations for many reasons, such as:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Smartcards provide an extra layer of security for Clinical Systems; it is therefore mandatory for everyone accessing a clinical system to access them using a Smartcard,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="IT development programme across the NHS aims to improve patient care by improving access to patient information,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="NHS Care Record Service (NHS CRS) contains patient information and is accessed by a number of local and national Systems, for example Summary care record and electronic prescribing,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Patient information contains confidential information restricted to those staff who are directly and indirectly providing healthcare to the individual,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Access to this information is subject to a high level of security call ‘two factor’ authentication 1. Smartcard and 2 passcode,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Registration Authority encompasses the responsibility and accountability framework for ensuring such access is controlled and meets required standards, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Smartcards are issued and managed via Care Identity Service System (CIS).
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The National Registration Authority is operated by NHS Digital (formerly known as HSCIC)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The NHS Digital National RA Policy Consists of:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The RA Hierarchy and the principle of delegated authority for local organisations to run their Registration Authority 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The roles and responsibilities within organisations that run their own Registration Authority activity
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The requirement to develop and implement a local RA policy
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The requirements for creating a nationally verified digital identity
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Requirements in relation to Smartcards" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter One, Logging on and Position Assignment " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="It is Mandatory that users sign the Terms and Conditions of Smartcard use, and there are three ways of viewing and accepting this, either:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="From the automatic pop up on first login,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Access via CIS quick link, or
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Reference to Terms & Conditions in the login box." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="In order to launch the Care Identity Service (CIS), Go to https://portal.national.ncrs.nhs.uk 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Then Select Launch Care Identity Service, this will take you to the dashboard you can see here.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="You must log onto CIS with your sponsor access role.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Sponsor first assigns a position to a user, this can be done by first going to the dashboard. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="In the search bar, enter the user’s UUID, NI number or Name, then click Search. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="·" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click on the UUID hyperlink of the user you wish to assign the position to, in order to load their profile
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="·" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="·" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Scroll down the profile to the section Position Assignment Details. Then click Modify Position Assignment 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Next, Select ‘Raise Request to Assign Position’ then click Add Position.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Select the position you wish to assign to the user via the tick box on the left and click Confirm Position to continue 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Add any relevant notes in Notes section (click + to expand section)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click Submit Request to complete your request. Clicking Submit Request also signifies sponsor’s approval of the Position Assignment, this will then be granted by an RA Agent.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Finally you will see a message stating that your request has been submitted, please log a call on the self service portal requesting access to be granted in CIS advising of the name, UUID number, name of position for the staff member.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="As a sponsor you may wish to raise a request to remove a staff member from your site or modify their current positions end date.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Go to the Dashboard then search for the user by entering their UUID, (Smartcard number) NI number or name.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Click on the UUID hyperlink of the user you wish to modify or remove their position.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The user’s profile will load, where you will then scroll down the profile to Position Assignment Details, click Modify Position.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Although the button is marked to ‘Raise Request to Assign Position’ this also applies to modifying/removing a position assignment.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="With the radio button selected labelled ‘Raise Request to Assign Positions’, the position will be displayed.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="You can then use the Edit & Delete icons to make modifications to the user’s existing position.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To edit a user’s end date, click the edit button, click the calendar icon, this allows you to change a user’s position end date. For example, if a user needs access until a particular date.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once the end date has been amended, scroll down to submit the request." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The delete bin button allows you to raise a request to remove the position from that user immediately.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Add any relevant notes in the Notes Section (click + to expand section)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Clicking Submit Request also signifies Sponsor Approval of the modification to the Position Assignment – this will then be granted by an RA Agent
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once your request has been submitted on CIS, please advise to log a call on self service portal under catalogue form Position Assignment and complete all details within the form.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Three, Additional Information and Final Assessment" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Smartcard Dos and Don’t’s:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Always keep your Smartcard safe and secure
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Never disclose your Smartcard Passcode
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Your Smartcard is for your individual use only
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Your Smartcard must never be shared even if you have exactly the same access as a colleague
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Inappropriate access using a shared Smartcard has implications for both the Smartcard user and the individual
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Never leave your Smartcard unattended
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Users retain their Smartcard when they leave an NHS organisation for another, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Immediately report any theft, loss or damage of Smartcards by contacting your RA team by logging a call on the Self Service Portal submitting the form for Lost or Damaged Smartcard
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You have now reached the end of this online training, you will need to complete an assessment exercise to continue. You will be expected to gain a pass mark of 60%. If you do not achieve this, we recommend you to go back through the course to refresh your knowledge before attempting the assessment exercise again." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="We strongly recommend you take a screenshot of this slide using the Printscreen key as evidence of the completion of this assessment." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Registration Authority Contact Details 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="IT Self Service Portal
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Email - itservicedesk@nchc.nhs.uk 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="NCHC Service desk - 01603 508622
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="NHS Digital Additional information (click to view) - Smartcard guidance leaflets
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="http://digital.nhs.uk/article/1125/care-identity-service-guidance-leaflets 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Register to self unlock your Smartcard
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="https://portal.national.ncrs.nhs.uk/portal/dt 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Two, Smartcard Unlocking and Certificate Renewal" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Users are prompted to renew their Smartcard certificates 90 days before expiry, but can only renew the card within 30 days of expiry.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To self-renew a Smartcard certificate you will need access to CIS and preferably an Omnikey card reader. You should consider renewing at a PC or workstation which is configured to access the NHS Spine Portal correctly. When prompted click Yes to start the renewal.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Confirm that you wish to renew your Smartcard certificate, click Continue. Then enter your passcode when prompted, click Confirm.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The renewal process will start, when complete you will be shown a success status message. We recommend testing the card to ensure the certificate has been renewed successfully.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Before unlocking any NHS Smartcard, assure yourselves of the user’s identity.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The user may have forgotten their passcode or locked their card by mistake (entering passcode 3 time incorrectly), remember that the passcode is case sensitive.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Two card readers are needed for this process - integrated keyboard card reader and Omnikey reader, or two Omnikey readers if the keyboard does not have an integrated reader.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="If a user has forgotten their passcode and locked or blocked their card, they will need to contact their Sponsor or Smartcard Administrator to unlock/unblock their Smartcard.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Sponsor or Smartcard unlocker logs into CIS, with the 2nd card reader connected to your PC. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Next, insert the card you wish to unlock in the second reader and Click Manage Smartcard.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="CIS will do a search and load the user’s profile, scroll down the page to the section Smartcard Details
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Ensure the radio button on the card is selected then click Service.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Next, select Unlock Smartcard, then click Continue.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The user will then be prompted to enter their old or new passcode. (ensure the user doesn’t press the enter key on the keyboard)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Only the user must enter their passcode (passcode must be between 4 and 8 characters) then click Confirm
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Success Message tab will be displayed upon successful unlock.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Smartcard Certificates expire every 2 years
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Users are prompted to renew their certificate 90 days before expiry but can only be renewed within 30 days of expiry
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text=" If you do not have a series 8 Smartcard please contact your RA support to issue a replacement card
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The Smartcard will be deactivated upon expiry and therefore cannot be renewed by a Sponsor but can be repaired/renewed by an RA ID checker under Manage Smartcard
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="If the sponsor cannot renew the certificates within 30 days of expiry please contact your ID Checker and ask them to renew your Smartcard certificate under their System Support access role. If the ID Checker cannot renew the certificate the sponsor will need to log a call on the self service portal requesting a replacement card.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Once you are logged into CIS with the second card reader connected to your PC, insert the card you wish to renew in the second reader and click Manage Smartcard.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="CIS will do a search and load the user’s profile, scroll down the page to the section Smartcard Details.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Then ensure the radio button on the card is selected then click Service.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="As with Smartcard unlocking, search for the user, select the affected Smartcard, click Service.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Then select Renew Certificate from the list and click Continue.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The user will be prompted to enter their passcode and Confirm, then the Smartcard will now renew – when completed we recommend getting the user to test the card. If the card does not renew, please log a call on the Self Service Portal to the RA Team who will advise on the issue with renewing certificates." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="New user (only for Pharmacies ) Sponsor to complete an RA request form advising of new users – Name/Contact information (telephone number and email address) and the position to be assigned to the new staff member. Log a call on the self service portal submitting similar form for your smartcard request
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Requesting to add/modify/remove access – Complete the RA request form with users Name, UUID new user position requested, organisation name and ODS code. Log a call on the self service portal submitting similar form for your Smartcard request
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Requesting a replacement Smartcard – Complete the RA request form with users – Name, UUID or NI number, your Smartcard number, name and address where Smartcard should be posted to
